  • All Classes

Package org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OrderingManager
    Generic methods to be implemented by the ordering manager classes.
    POPOpenConditionManager
    Precondition manager interface; stores and managaes the open conditions of a plan.
    SolutionChecker
    SolutionChecker interface allows to check if a plan is a solution.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GlobalIndexVarValueInfo
    GlobalIndexVarValueInfo class implements a global index for pairs (variable, value).
    HeuristicAdjustment
    HeuristicAdjustment class implements a message with heuristic information about landmarks to properly adjust the landmarks heuristic in multi-agent planning.
    InternalProposal
    InternalProposal class represents an agent's plan proposal.
    Memoization
    Memoization class stores the generated plans to avoid expand repeated plans during the search.
    MessageContentEncodedVarsValues
    MessageContentEncodedVarsValues class implements a message to encode pairs of (variable, value) with indexes, in order to keep privacy.
    MetricChecker
    MetricChecker class checks if a plan has the best average metric value.
    NewBasePlanMessage
    NewBasePlanMessage class implements a message to set the next base plan to expand.
    NewBasePlanMessage.HeuristicChange
    HeuristicChange class represents a heuristic value adjustment for a plan.
    Planner
    Planner abstract class: includes the basic planning methods used in POP and POPMultiThread.
    Planner.MessageFilterAdjustment
    MessageFilterAdjustment class: filter to receive heuristic valuea djustments from other agents.
    Planner.MessageFilterProposals
    MessageFilterProposals class: filter to receive messages with plan proposals from other agents.
    PlannerFactoryImp
    Configuration class; from the grounded task, it builds the objects necessary for the planner to work.
    POP
    Partial-Order Planner main class.
    POPAction
    Actions for POP planning.
    POPCausalLink
    Causal link between two steps of a partial-order plan; implements the CausalLink interface.
    POPComparatorABalanced
    POPComparatorABalanced class compares plans using the evaluation function: f(p) = 2*h(p) + g(p).
    POPComparatorALandmarks
    POPComparatorALandmarks class compares plans using the evaluation function: f(p) = hLand(p), and uses f(p) = 2*h(p) + g(p) to break ties.
    POPComparatorAQuality
    POPComparatorAQuality class compares plans using the evaluation function: f(p) = h(p) + g(p).
    POPComparatorASpeed
    POPComparatorASpeed class compares plans using the evaluation function: f(p) = h(p).
    POPCondition
    POPCondition class represents a condition between a variable and a value.
    POPFunction
    POPFunction class defines a POP variables.
    POPIncrementalPlan
    Incremental plans for the external search tree; each plan stores a new action w.r.t. its father.
    POPInternalPlan
    Internal incremental plan to calculate a refinement over a parent plan.
    POPMatrix
    Matrix of orderings.
    POPMultiThread
    Multi-thread Partial-Order Planner class.
    POPOpenCondition
    Open condition definition.
    POPOpenConditionManagerQueue
    POPOpenConditionManagerQueue class implements the open-condition manager using a priority queue.
    POPOrdering
    Models the ordering constraints on a partial order plan; implements the Ordering interface.
    POPOrderingManagerMemorization
    Ordering manager with memorization.
    POPOrderingManagerNoMemorization
    Ordering manager without memorization.
    POPPrecEff
    Function-value tuple that defines preconditions and effects in a POP.
    POPSearchMethodIDA
    Manages the search tree for an IDA* search.
    POPSearchMethodTwoQueues
    Manages the search tree for an A* search with two priority queues sorted by different evaluation functions.
    POPSolutionChecker
    Abstract class, partial SolutionChecker implementation.
    POPSolutionCheckerPrivateGoals
    POPSolutionCheckerPrivateGoals class checks for solutions in problems with private goals.
    POPStep
    Models the steps of a partial-order plan; implements the Step interface.
    POPThread
    POPThread class implements a thread for partial-order planning.
    POPThreat
    POPThreat class implements a threat in the plan (a step that threatens the condition of a causal link).
    ProposalToSend
    Serializable class to send/receive plan proposals to/from other agents.
    ProposalToSend.PCausalLink
    Serializable class to send/receive causal links.
    ProposalToSend.PGroundedCond
    Serializable class to send/receive grounded conditions.
    ProposalToSend.POpenCondition
    Serializable class to send/receive open conditions.
    ProposalToSend.POrdering
    Serializable class to send/receive orderings.
    ProposalToSend.PStep
    Serializable class to send/receive plan steps.
    StateMemoization
    StateMemoization class stores the generated plans to avoid expand repeated plans during the search.
